item.title: 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command?
item.dc:creator: @Mattshi96 Mattshi96
item.description:
@Mattshi96 wrote:

Hello, Your environment variables probably aren’t set right. Just look up a tutorial on that. If they are, Well i assume you are trying to compile so, right-click on your compile.bat file and click “edit” then the long code you see E.x “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\java.exe” change “jdk1.6.0_26” to the version of java you have, i hope that helped.

Read full topic

item.title: 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command?
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

It can’t find your jdk, make sure you have the code editted to your version of jdk. If you have done that already, make sure your variables are set.

Read full topic
